name: Strawberry Muesli Chia Smoothie
description: I noticed a bottled strawberry/lime/chia drink in the refrigerator section of Trader Joe’s recently, and thought I’d use the strawberry/chia combination in a smoothie. I added muesli for bulk and geranium syrup for flavor.
keywords: chia seeds, muesli, strawberry, halal, healthy, high fiber, kosher, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon soaked chia seeds (1 teaspoon dry unsoaked)
1 heaped cup ripe strawberries, hulled (about 6 ounces)

recipeInstructions.text: The night before, place the muesli in a small bowl or ramekin and cover with 3 tablespoons milk or water. Refrigerate overnight. Soak the chia seeds overnight as well.

Scoop up a tablespoon of seeds with the gooey liquid and place in a blender (don’t worry, your smoothie won’t have this consistency). Add the remaining ingredients and blend for 1 full minute at high speed.
